code: import axios from'axios';export var getTrendingMovies=function getTrendingMovies(){try{return axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_DATA_BASEURL,"/trending/movie/day?api_key=").concat(process.env.REACT_APP_KEY));}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export var getSearchMovies=function getSearchMovies(query){try{axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_DATA_BASEURL,"/search/movie?api_key=").concat(process.env.REACT_APP_KEY,"&query=").concat(query));}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export var getMoviesDetails=function getMoviesDetails(movieID){try{axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_DATA_BASEURL,"/movie/").concat(movieID,"?api_key=").concat(process.env.REACT_APP_KEY));}catch(error){console.log(error);}};
